title: Big Ben
creator_credit: Central Office of Information and British Movietone News
brief_description: The centenary of Big Ben and the history behind the famous chime. Prints from old editions of the “Illustrated London News” recall the casting and installation of the bell. Its significance as a symbol of hope during wartime is illustrated by a series of interviews. Commentary by James Mason.
